Inbox.subject: Fresh Tips: Contact Management and Deliverability

• PRODUCT NEWS •
<<contact management="">> [https://www.mailjet.com/blog/news/contacts-under-gdpr-ultimate-features/]
TIPS --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Contact Management under GDPR: The Ultimate Set of Tools You’ll Need In order to ensure your contact management practices are in line with GDPR, we have launched a series of features that will make it faster and easier for you to capture, store, and manage user consent. Want to have a look?
<<yes please!="">> [https://www.mailjet.com/blog/news/contacts-under-gdpr-ultimate-features/?utm source=Newsletter&utm medium=Email&utm campaign=EN-Product-NL-November2018]
<<avoid spam="" filters="">> [https://www.mailjet.com/blog/news/avoid-email-spam-filters/] How to Avoid Email Spam Filters 🙌 Are you sick and tired of seeing your beautiful emails landing in the spam folder? Almost 25% of email marketers now cite deliverability as one of their main barriers to effective marketing. We can help you start off on the right foot and land your email to its intended destination. <<learn more="">> [https://www.mailjet.com/blog/news/avoid-email-spam-filters/?utm source=Newsletter&utm medium=Email&utm campaign=EN-Product-NL-November2018]
<<widget via="" api="">> [https://www.mailjet.com/blog/news/how-to-set-up-a-double-opt-via-mailjets-api/] How to Set Up a Double Opt-In Subscription Form via Mailjet’s API A customer subscribing on your platform is like a verbal agreement of interest in receiving your communications, however a double opt-in confirmation is like getting their signature.
Want widgets that are entirely customizable in your emails? Or do you want to automate the way you add and manage new contacts on Mailjet and your CRM? Then use our APIs. <<step-by-step tutorial="">> [https://www.mailjet.com/blog/news/how-to-set-up-a-double-opt-via-mailjets-api/?utm source=Newsletter&utm medium=Email&utm campaign=EN-Product-NL-November2018]
Mailjet for developers --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
INTEGRATE
Check out our integration of the month: TYPO3 [https://www.mailjet.com/integration/typo3/?utm source=Newsletter&utm medium=Email&utm campaign=EN-Product-NL-November2018].
LEARN
All resources you need, just here [https://dev.mailjet.com/]!
HACK
Join Mailjet'scommunity of Developers [https://www.facebook.com/groups/MailjetDEV].
